title: Time Lapse for Astrophotography/Night mode? (Pixel 4)
content:
It would be incredible if there was a time lapse + astrophotography mode, to take moving galactic photos like this: https://giphy.com/gifs/OW4Uecmzzbzag
I should be fairly simple - automatically take an astrophotography photo (2-4 minutes), continuously for a set amount of time (i.e. 2 hours).
